targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date AS "time",
  CAST(SUM(positive) / $population as DECIMAL(10,8)) AS "Prevalence"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state IN($state)AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  CAST((SUM(positiveIncrease) / $population) * 1000 as DECIMAL(10,8)) AS "Incidence Rate"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state IN($state) AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(transit_stations_percent_change_from_baseline) AS "transit_stations_percent_change_from_baseline"
FROM data_google
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state_abbv IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  CAST(SUM(death) / SUM(positive) as DECIMAL(10,8)) AS "CFR"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state IN($state) AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  CAST(SUM(positive) / $population as DECIMAL(10,8)) AS "Prevalence"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state IN($state)AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

panels.description: This pannel compares the Incidence Rate (the increase in positives divided by the population) with anonymous change in mobility data from Google. The mobility data is compared with a baseline taken from Jan 3–Feb 6, 2020. This data is updated, every week or so.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date AS "time",
  CAST((SUM(positiveIncrease) / $population) * 1000 as DECIMAL(10,8)) AS "Incidence Rate"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state IN($state) AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(grocery_and_pharmacy_percent_change_from_baseline) AS "Pharmacy & Grocery"
FROM data_google
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state_abbv IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(transit_stations_percent_change_from_baseline) AS "Transit"
FROM data_google
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state_abbv IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(workplaces_percent_change_from_baseline) AS "Workplace"
FROM data_google
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state_abbv IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  CAST((SUM(positiveIncrease) / 331000000) * 1000 as DECIMAL(10,8)) AS "US Average"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  avg(retail_and_recreation_percent_change_from_baseline) AS "Retail"
FROM data_google
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state_abbv IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

panels.title: Incidence Rate vs. Mobility

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date AS "time",
  CAST(SUM(death) / SUM(positive) as DECIMAL(10,8)) AS "CFR"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state IN($state) AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(positive) AS "positive"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(totalTestResults) AS "totalTestResults"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  (SUM(totalTestResults) / ($population/1000)) AS "totalTestResults"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(death) AS "death"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

dataLinks.title: Data by The COVID Tracking Project

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(totalTestResultsIncrease) AS "Test Count"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(date,$__interval),
  sum(positiveIncrease) AS "Positive Count"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date) AND
  state IN ($state)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  (SUM(positiveIncrease) / SUM(totalTestResultsIncrease) * 100) as "Positive %"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  state in ($state) AND $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

SELECT
  date AS "time",
  (SUM(positiveIncrease) / SUM(totalTestResultsIncrease) * 100) as "US Avg. %"
FROM data_ctp
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(date,$__interval)

panels.description: This data is compiled by The New York Times. County-level totals may differ from other data sets present on the dashboard.

targets.rawSql: SELECT state_abbv as State, county as County, cases as Cases, ROUND((cases / $total_cases) * 100,2) as 'Case %', deaths as Deaths, ROUND((deaths / $total_deaths) * 100,2) as 'Deaths %' from data_nyt_county WHERE state_abbv IN ($state) AND date = (SELECT MAX( date ) FROM data_nyt_county WHERE state_abbv IN ($state)) ORDER BY cases DESC;

panels.title: County-level Impact

panels.content: This data is sourced from The COVID Tracking Project, The New York Times, the US Census Bureau, the IHME and Google.

list.definition: select state_abbv as __value, state_full as __text from data_us_data;
list.label: Select a State
list.name: state
list.query: select state_abbv as __value, state_full as __text from data_us_data;

list.definition:
SELECT SUM(usc_population_2019) as pop
FROM data_us_data
WHERE
  state_abbv IN ($state)
list.name: population
list.query:
SELECT SUM(usc_population_2019) as pop
FROM data_us_data
WHERE
  state_abbv IN ($state)

list.definition:
SELECT AVG(usc_density_2019) as density
FROM data_us_data
WHERE
  state_abbv IN ($state)
list.name: density
list.query:
SELECT AVG(usc_density_2019) as density
FROM data_us_data
WHERE
  state_abbv IN ($state)

list.definition:
SELECT SUM(cases) as cases
FROM data_nyt_county 
WHERE state_abbv IN ($state) 
AND date = (SELECT MAX( date ) FROM data_nyt_county WHERE state_abbv IN ($state))
list.name: total_cases
list.query:
SELECT SUM(cases) as cases
FROM data_nyt_county 
WHERE state_abbv IN ($state) 
AND date = (SELECT MAX( date ) FROM data_nyt_county WHERE state_abbv IN ($state))

list.definition:
SELECT SUM(deaths) as deaths
FROM data_nyt_county 
WHERE state_abbv IN ($state) 
AND date = (SELECT MAX( date ) FROM data_nyt_county WHERE state_abbv IN ($state))
list.name: total_deaths
list.query:

FROM data_nyt_county

AND date = (SELECT MAX( date ) FROM data_nyt_county WHERE state_abbv IN ($state))
